backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing products with search, sort, admin-only seeding, and access-control integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and behavior.
frontend/artifacts/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to retain the artifacts directory.
frontend/docs/LIVE_DEPLOYMENT_SMOKE_CHEC: Checklist for verifying successful frontend deployment and backend connectivity on IC mainnet.
frontend/docs/PLAY_STORE_TWA_GUIDE.md: Guide for packaging the PWA as a TWA and publishing it to the Google Play Store.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining color variables, dark mode values, and global theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML shell that loads the PWA manifest, icons, metadata, and mounts the React app.
frontend/public/env.json: Runtime configuration placeholder requiring injection of the backend canister ID during deployment.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/offline.html: Custom offline fallback page shown when the user loses network connectivity.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, offline handling, cache cleanup, and network-first fetch strategy with env.json exclusion.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-aab-release.s: Builds a signed Bubblewrap TWA release AAB, prompting for keystore details and producing an upload-ready bundle.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-apk-debug.sh: Builds a debug APK from the TWA project and copies the output to an artifacts directory for testing.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-apk-release.s: Builds a signed Bubblewrap TWA release APK using a provided keystore.
frontend/scripts/twa-init.sh: Initializes a Bubblewrap TWA project from a live web manifest, prompting for package name and output directory.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the React app router and layout, registers the service worker, and runs a runtime backend smoke check.
frontend/src/backend.did.ts: Empty placeholder file for backend canister type definitions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Modal dialog for creating or editing a product, wrapping the product form.
Form for creating or editing products with validation, image upload, and API mutations.
Displays a product list with editing, deletion, and stock toggle actions.
frontend/src/components/ConfigErrorState: Displays a detailed UI error state when backend configuration is missing or invalid, with troubleshooting steps.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Renders a product card with image, price, category, and navigation to the product details page.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Manages PWA installation prompts and fallback instructions depending on install availability and device state.
Shows a banner when a service worker update is available and lets the user refresh or dismiss it.
frontend/src/components/StoreFooter.tsx: Renders the store’s footer with links, brand info, and a copyright note.
frontend/src/components/StoreHeader.tsx: Displays the store header with navigation, authentication‑aware admin link, mobile menu, and PWA install prompt.
frontend/src/components/StoreLayout.tsx: Wraps the store UI with header, footer, update banner, and configuration loading/error handling.
frontend/src/config/appConfig.ts: Defines app slug and basic metadata used for deployment and branding.
frontend/src/config/index.ts: Loads and validates env.json configuration, providing canister IDs and network settings with caching and fallback behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnvConfig.ts: Loads runtime configuration via react-query and returns standardized config state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and stored-identity restoration using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Wraps product CRUD and stock toggle operations using actor-based queries and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin UI for managing products with authentication gating, tables, and create/edit dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero content, featured products, and navigation to shopping.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with navigation options to home and products.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed product information with loading, error, and not‑found states, including image, category, stock status, and navigation back to the product list.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists all products with search, sorting, loading skeletons, and error handling, using memoized filtering and sorting logic.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, logs lifecycle events, and dispatches custom events for update readiness and activation.
frontend/src/utils/imageToDataUrl.ts: Converts a File object into a base64 data URL using FileReader with basic error handling.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeSmokeCheck.ts: Runs a non‑blocking backend connectivity check by loading config and fetching products, logging detailed success or failure diagnostics.
frontend/src/utils/toUserMessage.ts: Maps various error types and messages to user‑friendly strings with special handling for configuration and common backend error patterns.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from query strings or hashes using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s metadata and pending request to deploy App draft Version 16 to production.
